page.title: 10Interesting Buildings
page.content: {Thomson's farmhouse}is in Golden Green ,and is the oldest house in our area. It was built in the 14th century. {Hadlow Castle}is the most prominent building in the Village. The Manor house called Court House stood on the site before the Castle was there. {The Parish church}was in existence in 975 and is famous for the Crusaders' crosses inscribed in the stone. The most interesting buildings in our area are the{oast}houses.Some are still in use,while others have been converted into private homes. The old houses in Hadlow are nice to look at especially those in{Church {Street. {The Cobblestones}(a building in Church Street)was a bakers and people can still remember it as a sweet shop.Now it is a private home.
